vr:Resource.Title: NCSA Radio Astronomy Imaging Naming Authority
vr:Resource.Subject: test

Summary.Description: This authority ID will be used to identify generic resources related to the NCSA Radio Astronomy Imaging Group at the National Center for Supercomputing Applications (NCSA)
